subject: Steroids
Hormones
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Roger Clemens’s lawyer has hired private investigators to try to challenge the credibility of Brian McNamee, who said that he had injected Clemens with steroids and human growth hormone.
snippet: Roger Clemens’s lawyer has hired private investigators to try to challenge the credibility of Brian McNamee, who said that he had injected Clemens with steroids and human growth hormone.
